title: Too Hard To Handle
description: 'Too Hard To Handle' is a blend of Fact and Fiction which is enhanced by the essence of Philosophy. It tries to find out the answers for certain questions like what happens if you mess with the flow of life? what matters above all in a relationship ? is it past, present or Future? What if you come to know something about your fiance/spouse which you thought never existed? And above all, Can you really trust your best friend? 'Too Hard To Handle' is story of Love,Friendship,Victory,Fate and LIFE.
author: Anamika Mishra
